website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a stylish bed to support your pup, this luxury dog couch is an ideal choice.
pros: Buyers raved over the product's sturdy and enduring craftsmanship, claiming the frame is solid and high-quality
Pillow cushions are removable but heavy enough to stay in place
Helps keeps dog off nice furniture
cons: Sizing can be difficult to estimate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large for my 94 lb American Bulldog. He LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: We built an Apartment for our dog under the stairs! He is a 6lb toy Shih Tzu and he LOVES his couch!
customer_reviews.author: MistieWorsham

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this couch!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 65lb Pit Bull and she fits pretty well on this couch (large). It would be great if it were just a few inches longer and wider, but she still fits fine and she loves it!! She sleeps in it often. The pillow is SO comfy, its heavy and plushy. The couch itself is really well made but still rather light weight so I can easily move it if I need to. Great purchase, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great size for Doodles
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a large dog. Memory foam-like padding. Extremely lightweight. I have a large golden doodle (80lbs.) and this is a perfect couch for him. He no longer looks to jump on our couches.
customer_reviews.author: rob c

customer_reviews.title: This sofa bed looks like a real couch and my husband threw a matching ...
customer_reviews.text: Our Pekinese loves his own couch! He is always wanting to be off the ground and on real furniture. This sofa bed looks like a real couch and my husband threw a matching throw on it, so at times he looks like a little human on a couch. The product is lightweight, easy to move and has a nice soft cushion our dog like to attempt to make softer. We love it and are considering getting a second one for our cat. Not sure why it is called a sofa bed, we call it a couch because that is our baby thinks of it as, he has his own couch!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kjellander

customer_reviews.title: I got a medium thinking it would be a good size for my 45lb dog
customer_reviews.text: Read a bunch of reviews and decided to buy this. I got a medium thinking it would be a good size for my 45lb dog. I wish I went with the large as it’s too small for them to lay comfortable so now it’s just a random tiny couch in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: “Large” Is Not For Large Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Great dog sofa, HOWEVER, the “Large” is more like a medium. Photos are deceiving (or I received wrong size). I bought this for my German Shepherd and it was too small. Gave it to my sister for her 2 little Shih Tzu dogs. They need to make Extra Large for big dogs!
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: My doxie loves it
customer_reviews.text: We ordered one of these for our dogs' room so they have somewhere to lay when we aren't home or while my husband is working. My dachshund LOVES it and spent the entire first day we had it laying on it. We actually ordered another one. Our corgi hasn't tested it out yet, but he may once we have two. Super cute, seems well made, and shipped put together. The ONLY issue we had was that it was literally inside a box inside another box, which is a total waste. But that has no bearing on how awesome this little bed is!
customer_reviews.author: Kari D

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Received the Keet Fluffly Deluxe Pet Bed today for my cat today. Came securely packaged. I bought the medium because my kitty boy is bigger than the average kitty. It fits him perfectly and he seems to really like it. It’s solidly made and the pillow is like memory foam, seems pretty comfortable and it cradles him nicely. I definitely would recommend this attractive pet bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jadine

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Manufacture
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is smaller that does not cover the width of the sofa. There is an rectangular wood frame with no support wood in the center. The center is just fabric that can probably tear easily. Poorly manufacture for the small size bed.
customer_reviews.author: A Prime Customer in LA

customer_reviews.title: Good for 47 lb pitbull but sent wrong couch
customer_reviews.text: They sent the wrong product. I ordered a brown leather and they sent a tan velour. I didn't want the light color or the material for durability reasons. My dog loves it and the perfect size for my 50 lb pitbull. I have her tucked in the corner behind my desk at work and she couldn't be happier. Just wish they sent the right couch for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Caione

customer_reviews.title: Good structure but cushion is lacking
customer_reviews.text: The construction of the sofa frame is good and what we were expecting, but our dog was not interested. Upon sitting on it ourselves, we could see why. We could feel the wooden planks in the frame right through the cushion itself. What we initially thought was a great deal for a dog sofa bed is turning out to be quite pricey, because we are now needing to buy a new cushion to put on the sofa instead of the one which was provided.
customer_reviews.author: DJSchrei

customer_reviews.title: love this pet couch
customer_reviews.text: love this pet couch. It's made well and if there's an accident the seat cushion comes right off and go in the wash without a problem. Also the cushion is softer and nicer than any dog bed I've ever purchased. Good size for the price. I ordered a medium and my two mini dachshunds lay on it together comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog bed!
customer_reviews.text: I used to cover my couch with a dog cover and would let my 2 dogs hog the couch. Not anymore! This dog bed is well constructed, sturdy, looks great and my dogs love it! In the first picture, I left it sitting on the floor. In the last two pictures, you can see it’s on those supports for raising a bed. This seems to be working better for them because they do enjoy looking out the window. I purchased the large size and it seems to be just right for my dogs. They are about 30 lbs. each. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: double10ski

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for the doggies
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for the doggies! I love the fact that the little mattress cover comes off and can be washed! I think this bed will hold up very well over time, as I think the quality is good. We have 3 dogs- one that is about 45 pounds and the other two are 22 and 30 lbs. The 2 smaller dogs can both easily fit up there together and the bigger dog fills the bed up, but she looks comfy definitely NOT a tight squeeze. I definitely recommend this bed, plus the price can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable Dog Couch
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is so cute! My short fat dog was thrilled to finally have somewhere besides the floor to lay. I really appreciate that the cushion can be removed/replaced as needed since our dog has a bad habit of chewing up her beds (hence why she’s been sleeping on the floor lately lol) So far its held up well enough that my kids can sit down there on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: alaskachik17

customer_reviews.title: Just as explained and loved that I did nothing but take it out of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo cute. Not upset that I bought this... Just as explained and loved that I did nothing but take it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for your pup.
customer_reviews.text: It's just perfect for my Yorkie he loves it. The one in the picture is a medium-sized bed and he's about 10 pounds and fits perfect. I bought a pillow case for the cushion so it won't get too nasty.
customer_reviews.author: candy_man12

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: love it it’s very light weight , the bedding is soft and it’s not attached it could use more stuffing in it which I’ll probably add myself but overall it’s great I bought the medium my pug is on the bulkier side lol but she fits it perfect and It must be comfortable because she won’t get off it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great option!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog was suddenly jumping up on the couch during the night - we have a no furniture policy - so we needed to find something for her to sleep on other than a low stuffed bed. This dog couch works great! She seems to love it. It comes already assembled so you just unpack it and put it where you want it. I vacuum the cushion weekly as she sheds a lot but otherwise it's very easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne M

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute little sofa!
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's GREAT! The center of the couch is missing support. We will add some beams to help give better support just in case. But for the price, we are very satisfied. The pillow is made up of bits of memory foam, which is great for our senior lab. Hoping this keeps them off of our couches. At the moment we are all in love with this little couch! Other than a few minor issues, the quality is pretty good! It comfortably fits our 75lb lab and 17 lb poodle. They love it! May purchase another since we have 3 pups!
customer_reviews.author: Sonnie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: She likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a large size for my 60 lb lab mix. I was trying to get her from sleeping on the couch as often, mission accomplished! She would not sleep on her previous dog bed that was on the floor so I decided to try this elevated one and she does enjoy it, although it took her about three days to really get used to it and I had to put "her" blanket on it. One con is that the cushion does not stay on so well I have to push it back on about once a day.
customer_reviews.author: brian reviews1

customer_reviews.title: The only pet bed my dog will not destroy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. She sleeps on it and sits on it during the day. I have one inside my home and one in the garage. It looks the same on the picture. Great price--the pillow is comfortable and sturdy enough for the dog. It fits her well--she is about 50 lbs. Try one--she has destroy all the other beds that I have purchased within the last year--this one she has not rip apart--I think she likes this one--if not, it would be ripped to pieces by now....
customer_reviews.author: PearBoomer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our family room furniture
customer_reviews.text: It took my dog a few days to use her new couch bed. She is a Puggle and weighs 30lbs I initially bought size medium but had to return it for a Large because medium was to small. The large size is a good size for her giving her room to spread out. The couch is actually fairly small for bigger dogs like labs and such. Maybe they have extra large for large dogs. We’re happy with our purchase and the quality is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Our dog has her OWN couch.....
customer_reviews.text: Our Lucie loves her couch we do too, she now does not get on our couch anymore. We changed the legs to make them higher, haven't had time to stain the but will. We are very happy. The couch is flimsy we put a piece of thin plywood then the doggie pillow it's more stable could have been better made but so far Lucie is happy...
customer_reviews.author: JoLee

customer_reviews.title: The LARGE is FANTASTIC for 2
customer_reviews.text: WOW, I wish I would have found this a long time ago!!! For 80.00 this is a great product. A washable cushion, sturdy base, washable if needed (wipe and go) and it looks GREAT. they immediately got on and slept!!! I LOVE IT. The rest of the family approved as well saying it looked "nice" and didnt look like a dog bed...finally a nice piece of furniture for the 4 legged family members! GET THIS you will not be disappointed! (THE LARGE is the way to go!)
customer_reviews.author: all4ofusgreen

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool dog bed/couch. Looks good with your furniture, durable and comfy pillow. The only reason for the 4 stars is because the XL really isn't for XL dogs. My 80lb boxer couldn't get comfortable because there wasn't enough room for him, but he tried. I ended up giving it to a friend who has a medium size dog and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My Dog is Smiling
customer_reviews.text: Got it today! & Bruno (the dog) cannot resist it! He loves it. Just look at that smile! He won't lay anywhere else, not even on me- when I lay on the floor. He sits on me for a sec....then makes his way to the bed! Will update later, if easy to clean. But for now....no buyers remorseful.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: I am beyond thrilled, and so are my pups 🐶❤️🐶
customer_reviews.text: This dog sofa is the best thing I've ever bought on Amazon, paws down. I've been struggling for a couple years to be completely independent, all the while dreaming of all the nice things I wanted in my future space. I had a list dedicated to dog sofas, and promised my two pups that it would be my first luxury purchase. And here we are. It happened! My big girl Clover is was wary of it at first, but that quickly subsided. It's the perfect size for her. She's 45lbs and long legged, and fits perfectly. It was all worth it to see that sleepy face.
customer_reviews.author: Artemis Rose

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua Approved
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love laying down on the couch so I figured I would get them their own! Its perfect, it matches my couch with is brown and leather like. And the cushion is like memory foam. My dogs were shy being near it at first but now they love laying down on it. The size I bought was large since I wanted them to have extra space. And the arm rests are not firm so it shouldn't hurt your dog if that is where they like to rest their head.
customer_reviews.author: JMichellex

customer_reviews.title: She loves it, and so do I!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful piece! It looks like a mini human couch! It is a nice warm place for her to relax while I am working. The stitching is beautiful, the bedding doesn't smoosh down when she gets in, and it looks good from every angle. Considering it is as much money as less attractive beds, I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Instead of a solid bottom under the pillow/cushion, there ...
customer_reviews.text: Instead of a solid bottom under the pillow/cushion, there are support boards that leave gaps in which my dog sinks. Also, one of our supports was loose dangling from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best dog purchases EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves this bed! He is a 16lb pomeranian (I know, he's big!). I purchased a medium bed for him. He spends a lot of time in his bed and has even started sleeping in it overnight. When my mom's dog comes to visit she automatically hops into this bed! You should see two dogs trying to lay on this bed together! It's an added bonus that this bed matches my living room furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a little fat frenchie
customer_reviews.text: They were out of the medium size bed when I ordered the large one and it turned out perfect. My frenchie is 34 lbs and he has plenty of room to stretch. Looks very nice and is easy to take the cover off the cushion to wash. Lightweight and easy to move around as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these in medium for our 8 lb girl. She loves all her beds and hoped right on her new couch when it arrived. This goes well with our living room furniture and also works perfectly in my office.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coach/bed
customer_reviews.text: Our two Angels love this bed/couch and it blends with our furniture perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tears26

customer_reviews.title: Legs unscrew if need be.
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger dog who is tough on furniture. The legs unscrewed easy enough so this will sit flat on the floor instead of being raised. Hopefully that will help keep it intact longer than the previous one I ordered (different brand)
customer_reviews.author: A. Nonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is not well made or was handled poorly as it’s already been repaired! It really is not for a large dog. The bedding already has a hole. I was very disappointed in it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Bussing

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!!  And very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Our Alfonso approves!! This little couch is absolutely adorable! It's very well made, and the cushion is very comfy and cozy. Alfonso is a 10-pound Pomeranian Chihuahua cross and he has lots of room to cuddle up, and I bought the small size. Some reviews are misleading the small is a perfect size.. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Rice

customer_reviews.title: Saved my life !!!! Pup loves it 🐶
customer_reviews.text: OMG this bed has saved my life lol ! I’ve tried many other beds for my pup and she wouldn’t stay on the floor instead she would be in my bed , which is ok but she snores so loud and I don’t sleep Sound because I’m Worried that my hubby might roll on her and hurt her she’s a mini poodle . Since we got the bed 4 days ago she’s bed in her own bed on the floor!!!!! Yay!!! I’m So happy 😀 best spent $$$
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made, and is relatively cheap compared to other dog couches. It looks good and the cushion is really soft to the touch. My dog loves it! My dog is 30 pounds and I ordered the large and I'm happy with the size.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best dog bed ever. My dogs are literally fighting over who gets to lay on it. I bought two and waiting for the other to arrive. Definitely a MUST for any dog lover/owner. It's well made- durable yet light weight. It even matches my couch perfectly so my pups will stay off the people couch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stick with it!!
customer_reviews.text: It took maybe a week or two for our cat to conquer her fear of the bed but she LOVES it now and it looks fantastic as promised. Quality is great and construction solid. Pillow can be removed.
customer_reviews.author: FranO

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this and it matches our furniture perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My French Bulldogs love this bed and it matches our furniture perfectly. I’m glad we ordered the bigger size because they all curl up on it together. It’s very well made and so easy to clean. My sister came to visit before Christmas and ordered one for her fur babies too. I am super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Houston

customer_reviews.title: The cushion has changed for the worse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same dog sofa last year and decided to add another since it was so great. Well....something has changed with the cushion. It is no longer nice heavy foam. 🙁 the cushion is now light and moves around too easily and bunches up. Very disappointed that the cushion has changed
customer_reviews.author: johnathan beck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 75 lb puppy
customer_reviews.text: Big enough and if your dog is spoiled on the daily he will love this I added a pic of the first day I got it the first time he got on it he wouldn’t even lift his head when I called his name the only thing is I wish it had some Velcro on the bottom of cushion considering he is wild sometimes and will run right on it (I added it myself )
customer_reviews.author: Celeste D Honea

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great item my German Shepherd loves it ! Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Sageonkel

customer_reviews.title: Got both medium and large beds
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these beds. I have a 45 lb and a 75 lb dog, they both fit in either bed; we have the medium and large bed. Usually my big dog pulls the cushion off and lays on the floor with it. The large bed has a bar in the middle, it is not comfortable for people to sit, but I am not sure if it bothers my bigger dog, the smaller dog doesn't seem to mind it.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this doggy sofa! Excellent quality! The color is just as advertised. The cushion is so comfy. I have a shiz tzu and a shorkey. They love it and the size allows them both to stretch out comfortably . Looks great in my living room ! Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: D Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother with this.
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is super thin. It hardly has any padding. You can feel the wood structure beneath the faux leather. I didn't want my dog to hurt himself so I returned it. Don't waste your time. Get something padded and comfortable for your pet. It's a shame because it is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Cimberlye

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved it. Boyfriend happy.
customer_reviews.text: When I moved in with my boyfriend he was freaking out about the dog hair everywhere. (My dog is 11 pounds but sheds like a 100 lb dog would) we were able to compromise that he wouldn’t be allowed on the couch, but allowed on the bed. But he looked so sad down there after 6 years up there with me... this solved the problem! Took him a couple days to take to it but now he loves it. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle

customer_reviews.title: Great bed.
customer_reviews.text: Got it today. Very impressed with it...well built. Beautiful. Looks like real furniture in our living room. Size is perfect...got medium for my WFT and Min. Schnauzer. Pad is soft but firm enough for good support for older dogs. They jumped in it right away....
customer_reviews.author: Sherri M.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I’ve ever ordered from Amazon! My pets absolutely love it and we use it as a bed for my 1 year old corgi. It’s very nicely built and the cushion is very soft. I definitely recommend it to anyone who wants a cute little couch bed for their pets!
customer_reviews.author: PGJ

customer_reviews.title: Solid value - No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: I looked at quite a few doggie couches, including many that were more expensive than this one. I was skeptical, but this couch surpassed my expectations. Quality leather like base and a well fitting, washable cushion that my dog loves. Size was a concern as it is often difficult to judge based on generic weight recommendations, but the Medium was perfect for my 13 lb Terrier mix. Finally, no assembly required - just removed from box and my dog immediately starting enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Post

customer_reviews.title: We love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl and I love this thing. She will seek it out and when I go looking, I will find her sleeping on it. Just like a small couch, and it work well for her. It is built nicely, and the cushions soft and snuggly. Good product. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Selina1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It’s so nicely made and the cushion is so comfortable. Our dog loves this thing! I swear he can’t sit on this without falling asleep lol. He grabs his toys, hops on, plays for a little while and then just knocks out. It’s great. Fits in nicely with our own furniture so.... win-win lol
customer_reviews.author: Eve Qureshi

customer_reviews.title: Very happy grand pup
customer_reviews.text: My grand pup absolutely loves her new bed! I was concerned about the quality of such an inexpensive bed but was pleasantly surprised at how well built it is. The material used are great quality and durable. Others complain of the cushion sliding but we found that adding Velcro to the bottom of the Cushion solves the problem perfectly. I have one very happy grand pup.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nadel

customer_reviews.title: Cute dog bed!
customer_reviews.text: Bed is as described. My dog is being annoying and not laying in it. He is apparently more particular about his dog beds than I realized. So I put his gross dog bed in the couch dog bed and now he uses it. Have to be tricky with dogs sometimes :)
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Dogs won't go near it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my 14yo MiniPoodle thinking it'd be nice for her to sleep on instead if just a bed on the floor. Well she won't go anywhere near it and neither will my 1yo puppy. So now this super expensive bed just sits in the corner collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marks

customer_reviews.title: Dog and owner approved!
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is better than expected. Looks like adult sofa. My pup is usually shy over something new. He jumped in it right way and went to sleep.I have it next to my matching brown recliner and he and I are very happy! My dog is 11 pounds and I got the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Magill

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love these beds
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these beds. They look fabulous and we have a small dog and a medium sized Beagle--everyone fits on the beds with plenty of room. They are sturdy. The little dog weighs about 15 pounds and the Beagle weighs about 35. They came quickly and pulled right out of the box ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Brant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Leather Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves his lil leather couch. Plus it matches my set. Only problems, and this has nothing to do with company or product, my pup can’t jump up on the bed yet. He’s just a lil guy, so he’ll figure it out. And it’s so comfy my cat is trying to take it over for herself
customer_reviews.author: Josh Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Way too small and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and size is very small. I have a 35 pound lab mix and got the large bed after reading reviews. It is too small for her and even through the cushion you can feel all the wood beams beneath a shear piece of fabric that covers them. For this price I expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: paige hodges

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality! Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful, high quality product! The cushion is even memory foam. At first my dog did not know if it was for her but she has now got the hang of it in less than 24 hours. My dog is a seven pound Pomeranian. I ordered the medium size and think it is a perfect fit. She has room to stretch all of the way out. However, a small would have worked just fine. I love her little bed! It is so adorable and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin and Jenna White

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for our 50 dog. We retrofitted the legs it now matches the highth of our bed. She likes it and we love not sharing our bed space.
customer_reviews.author: Whatcomgirl

customer_reviews.title: Size Medium , Color Charcoal || LOVE LOVE LOVE 💗
customer_reviews.text: So this is the size medium , my chihuahua is only 5 pounds & can literally fit in my purse ( to help compare size ) . If you’re thinking about buying this for your dog GET IT ! They’re gonna love it my Dingo jumped in it as soon as i put it on the floor , the cushion is super soft and comfy , easy to clean just wipe it down. Its cute in pictures but once you see it in person you’re gonna be soo happy best investment ever 😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: 𝓫𝓸𝓸𝓶 𝓫𝓸𝓸𝓶

customer_reviews.title: Great item!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I have three dachshunds and needed a couch big enough for all three of them, trying to keep them off the human couch 😊 This product exceeded my expectations, so happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gyfteas

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My Ginger loves her little couch!!! The moment she saw it she knew right away that it belongs to her. With so much rain lately, she is enjoying it even more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's not as heavy as I thought it would be, but it's sturdy and the dogs love it. They spend the day tricking each other off it so they can lay on it.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine

customer_reviews.title: MJ loves her couch!
customer_reviews.text: MJ neeeded a new place to chill, and I saw this and gave it a try. It’s lower profile which is great for her older age. She absolutely loves it and it’s super stylish. Highly recommended. One thing is the cushion doesn’t completely fill the couch mold, but works perfectly regardless.
customer_reviews.author: GregMCooper79

customer_reviews.title: They all love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my large lab, he will use it but he doesnt like being off the ground, even though he loves the regular couch. The cats and pomeranian all over it and pile on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chic dog interior decor
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves this bed. He’s half Chihuahua/Corgi, about 17 pounds. He’s curled up in the photo. But, this bed allows him to stretch out, too. We added two stretcher wedges, also found on Amazon, (exercise accessories) and made ramps out of them because he has chronic back problems. The combination of this super cute floor bed and the ramps has really helped him heal and deterred him from jumping on and off the, “big dog couch.”
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Boo

customer_reviews.title: Great little couch
customer_reviews.text: Great little couch. I only wish that the areas under the cushion where made of spill resistant material in case my dogs had pee accidents on it, that way the whole couch would not possibly be ruined because it would be very hard to clean 100%. I'm putting a pee pee pad under the cushion but that takes away from the fancy look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought the large for my two weenie babies. They like to sprawl out and be comfy. They love this couch and so do I. It's so cute and very well made. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sylina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents' dogs and it's sooo cute! The puppies love it! So cute and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Ayla Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the larger one since I have 6 mini schnauzers. They could all pile up together if they wanted to but usually only 2-3 lay on it at a time. They like it as the feel they are on the couch. My kids like to set in it also. I haven’t had to wash it yet. The gray is great at not showing dirt as fast.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES this
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure how he likes this product but he loved it from the moment it arrived. He stays on it all the time. I am so happy that I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Modern and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I have an 100+ pound pit who loves our couches so we decided to get him one of his own! It is a bit small (than expected, he sprawls out a lot) but he still fits nicely in it- not uncomfortable or oddly positioned. However, there is a bar in the middle that you can feel through the bed padding itself. We just added some more fluff and an extra small pad to cushion it and he loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I took the couch out of the box, my dog was in love with it. Good sturdy quality and absolutely adorable.
customer_reviews.author: hoyasilver

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this bed and she doesn’t like dog beds
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed and she doesn’t like dog beds. She kept getting on the top pillow of my nicer couch and squishing it. Then I got this bed and she is always in it. And it looks really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs work
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bed but the frame needs work. The middle bar is too jabbey. My dog liked this but after a while wouldn't sit on it. I felt it and the middle beam presses against her. I think my dog is just too fat. Great bed. Nice and soft but the frame needs work
customer_reviews.author: Denise Love

customer_reviews.title: looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Bella loves her bed it has been a couple of months and still looks like new. She is 70lb dog so after a couple of months you can hear some squeaking when she gets on and off but other than that it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Leevan castillo

customer_reviews.title: Bed is cosmetically appealing with living room furniture; carefully operate zipper
customer_reviews.text: This bed is absolutly beautiful! It makes my dog really feel more like a family member, as she is now off the floor on a couch of her own. The only downfell is that the zipper broke after 3 washing and I have had to use binder clips to hold it place. Ideally I hope to find a pillow that will fit the frame portion of the bed and find covers for it. Frame is very strong and probably sturdy for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Milton Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: This bed is as pictured. It's a steal for the price, honestly. My toddler and dog fight over who gets to sit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Hayes

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies love this Bed. As soon as I pulled it out the box They knew it was for them. Great quality made product.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Style Elite

customer_reviews.title: High quality pet sofa
customer_reviews.text: My seven pound chihuahua loves this pet sofa. I bought the medium size so she would have extra room, and it is perfect! It is very well made, and seems like it should last for quit some time. I highly recommend this sofa. I dropped one star because I think it could have more support in the cushion, but not a big drawback. I would definitely purchase it again, or suggest buying one for your furry friend!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Size Large
customer_reviews.text: my doggo is 20 lbs and is a medium size dog i read a lot of reviews so went instead with the Large and he loves it, he likes to stretch and sleep very comfortable as you can see in the pictures. I suggest id you dont want a big more a medium would be fine because the large is a big for him but he seems to love the space it all come downs to preference i hope you guys enjoy my pictures! (:
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Style n comfort
customer_reviews.text: completely put together it came out the box, my 2 pups went and lazy their lazy tails down, I love it, fits well with the living room furniture
customer_reviews.author: Onekar

customer_reviews.title: Look at Measurements vs. Weight
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe, sizing too small for a medium; too big for a large. Otherwise, it's a good dog bed.
customer_reviews.author: NoreenEugene

customer_reviews.title: Doggy comfort at it's best!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Just got it today and my boy walked on it and laid down as if he already knew it was his!! Now hes got his own sofa and will stay off mine...but we know he won't. And it matches my sectional 😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Keith B

customer_reviews.title: They think it is adorable that my dog has a couch in our house ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES her couch! It even draws positive attention from human's too! They think it is adorable that my dog has a couch in our house too!
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: My dog is so happy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this couch. It’s beautiful and it’s so comfortable for my dog. The price was great!
customer_reviews.author: D. Corrales

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed! I bought the large size for my spoiled 14 pound terrier. Both of my dogs fit on the bed with pillows!
customer_reviews.author: kristinmbaca

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought new furniture and wife didnt want the dog on it. This matches our furniture and our dog enjoys her new bed
customer_reviews.author: Rob Pom

customer_reviews.title: not from a  medium size dog
customer_reviews.text: It was to small for my 55 lb dog. But works great for the cat. The return was going to cost half the cost of the bed. So I kept and put my cat in it.
customer_reviews.author: Corrinne Oppedyk

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS BED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loveeeeeee this bed. My dog is a jack Russell / chihuahua and he’s about 30lbs. The large bed is perfect. He loves it. It’s sturdy and it stays put. Doesn’t move with he gets up or he can’t pull it around the house. Best $$$ I have spent on dog beds in 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Garcia

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems to really enjoy this bed/couch
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to really enjoy this bed/couch. It’s holding up well. However she still likes to lay on our couch more! Which was why I got it to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: needs a bigger/thicker pad to make it comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love the bed, but the pad that comes with it is pretty thin and the bed is not comfortable. We ended up buying a thicker pad to go under the included pad and it's much softer and more comfortable now for our big dogs. We have an 80# pit bull and 40# pit bull and they sleep on it together :).
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly disappointed. Paid the higher price for chocolate sofa. What I got was black sofa with chocolate pad.
customer_reviews.author: KKranz

customer_reviews.title: My dog is the most prissy Beagle on the planet ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is the most prissy Beagle on the planet and looks boss as hell on this thing. Only thing missing is a gold chain my wife won't let me buy her.
customer_reviews.author: austinguy

product_meta.title: Keet Fluffly Deluxe Pet Bed, Sofa Charcoal, Small
product_meta.description: Size:Large| Color:ChocolateFor a touch of elegance and loads of comfort, fluffy sofa dog bed features a combination of leatherette and soft minky fabric. It is upholstered with leatherette fabric. A separate reclaimed memory foam cushion is covered with soft minky dots fabric to complete the sofa beds stylish appearance. For dogs up to 40 lbs.
feature_bullets: Hand made out of strong wood frame and upholstered with Leatherette fabric
Includes a reclaimed shredded memory foam cushion, covered with soft minky dots fabric
Zippered cushion cover is removable for washing and the Leatherette can be easily wiped down to help maintain the sofa bed appearance.
For pets up to 40 lbs. Chair care is spot clean
Cushion Care- Machine wash with warm water
